1301450.name: Groove Catcher Demo
1301450.description:
Get an early glimpse of Groove Catcher - the rhythm game that brings the flow, groove and art. From chill and meditative to heart-pounding workouts, Groove Catcher has you covered. You got your own groove to share? Great! Make some levels in our super-natural, in-game level builder, and share them online with the world on our dedicated site [coming real soon]. We love all kinds of music so have a range of styles in the game, and it's simple to load your own for making levels.

This is our first public demo, and it's a snapshot of where we're headed. So try it out and follow us to see everything else we have planned that's coming down the road!

This demo is limited with a smaller selection of levels and songs.
